H0.text: Tornado is the type of storm that causes the most flooding in areas located near an ocean coastline.

H1.text: A hurricane is the type of storm that causes the most flooding in areas located near an ocean coastline.

H2.text: Blizzard is the type of storm that causes the most flooding in areas located near an ocean coastline.

H3.text: Freezing rain is the type of storm that causes the most flooding in areas located near an ocean coastline.

A4.text: The storm surge, or the increase in sea level due to the cyclone, is typically the worst effect from landfalling tropical cyclones

A5.text: The storm surge, or the increase in sea level due to the cyclone, is typically the worst effect from landfalling tropical cyclones, historically resulting in 90% of tropical cyclone deaths
